catch_copy: Carmageddon smashes back with a spin-off roguelite vehicular‑combat mayhem. Adapt, upgrade, and unleash destruction on post‑apocalyptic zombie hordes.
copyright_text: Carmageddon: Rogue Shift ©  2025. All rights reserved. Developed & Published with love by 34BigThings.
description:
BRUTAL CAR COMBAT REBORN

The legendary Carmageddon engine tears into 2050’s post‑apocalyptic streets. By day the skyline smolders; by night zombie hordes – the Wasted – flood every avenue. Your only way out is to win the Carmageddon: a chain of lethal underground races whose champion earns a shot at the last spaceport beyond the mountains.

FEATURES

 Roguelite campaign – every run is a new branching map of events, shops and bosses.  
 15 upgradeable vehicles – FWD, RWD & AWD tanks, buggies and hot‑rods with dynamic visual damage.  
 13 weapon classes – shotguns, miniguns, missile racks, railguns, lasers and more.  
 80+ perks – stack synergies that turn your rust bucket into a rolling apocalypse.  
 Dynamic weather & day‑night cycle – rain slicks the tarmac, dawn burns away the fog.  
 Elite & Boss events – square off against corrupted Enforcer patrols and colossal war‑rigs.  
 Permanent progression – spend Beatcoins in the Black Market to unlock new cars, guns and perks between runs.

GAMEPLAY LOOP

 Race or wreck – bash rivals, mow down Wasted, drift corners, hit ramps and rack up Credits.  
 Choose your path – the campaign graph branches toward shops, challenges and hidden elites.  
 Refit on the fly – repair, swap weapons or bolt on fresh perks before the next event.  
 Defeat the area boss – only a wrecking‑ball victory opens the gate to the next district.  
 Escape… or die trying – if you crash and burn the Carmageddon restarts with a new driver, but your long‑term unlocks stay.

WHY IT HITS DIFFERENT

Carmageddon: Rogue Shift blends the signature metal‑on‑metal carnage of the classic series with modern roguelite depth and silky arcade handling. Whether you live for stylish drifts, tactical loadouts or pure destruction racing, every run dishes out new combos and highlight‑reel moments.
network_feature_description:
This software supports the following:
- Surround sound (linear PCM)
